item.title: Chuck Norris Botnet Karate-chops Routers Hard (stolen title)
item.description: Yeah, cheesy title for an article (original below). But after recently having to help out too many clients and friends with virus issues, I wanted to get this article out there. Its an interesting real-life example of why you should change the password on your router, (and not leave passwords blank in general). Oh, for those who don’t speak techie, the router is what usually connects you to the Internet (whether wired or wireless).
